channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Using hugo build my first blog
item.description: Using hugo build my first blog hugo 1.download hugo https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases 2.cmd input: hugo new site myblog 3.download themes themes.gohugo.io 4.hugo server -t simplicity –buildDrafts 5.hugo new post/blog.md git for windows git config –list git config user.name git config user.email
